title: BREAKING: One Person Killed As Protests, Teargas Rock Charlotte For A Second Night (UPDATES)
text:
Now Reading
BREAKING: One Person Killed As Protests, Teargas Rock Charlotte For A Second Night (UPDATES)
0 Shares
Read Next
The protests that shook the city of Charlotte last night and injured sixteen police officers have continued into a second night. One person has been shot dead ; it is still unclear whether or not the police or a civilian was the shooter. The public displays of frustration over the police shooting of Keith Lamont Scott have mostly been peaceful but certain agitators have been escalating the situation with rocks and looting.
The police, in their imposing riot gear and hurling tear gas into the crowds, are not de-escalating matters. The protesters are demanding that the police release the video of the killing of Keith Lamont Scott; the state is responding the only way it knows how – with violence.
We hope that protesters will remain peaceful and understand their frustration with the reckless enthusiasm with which American police officers seem to be killing African-American citizens.
UPDATE: It appears the National Guard is on the way.
Reporter @JoeBrunoWSOC9 says "help is coming from Washington" per #Charlotte mayor. #CharlotteProtest #CharlotteUprising #KeithScott
Here is a livestream of the incident, courtesy of RT.
Updates will continue to be posted as they occur.
Protestors huddle in pkg garage after getting hit by tear gas. Pour milk in eyes & mouth. Say do not use water in eyes. #CharlotteProtest pic.twitter.com/INGqArCENK
See Also
RT MashableNews: Police rush to grab, arrest protester at #CharlotteProtest pic.twitter.com/GSYMs2Srmh
What do you think?
Don’t let Trump fire Special Prosecutor Mueller
Special Prosecutor Mueller has found enough evidence to bring charge in his investigation of the Trump campaign’s alleged collusion with Russia, but President Trump has openly talked of firing Mueller before he can bring justice. Don’t let him! Demand Congress pass a law preventing Trump from firing Mueller before it’s too late.
Thank you for making your voice heard!
